turkish_example_sentence: O ünlü ressam o değerli sanat eserlerine sahip olmamışsa, sergisini açamazdı.
english_example_sentence: If that famous painter had not owned those valuable artworks, he could not have opened his exhibition.
russian_example_sentence: Если бы тот известный художник не владел теми ценными произведениями искусства, он не смог бы открыть свою выставку.
turkish_example_sentence_with_blank: O ünlü ressam o değerli sanat eserlerine ______, sergisini açamazdı.
